mapper.select: select l.zymc,l.xtbh from res_gld_ly l,res_gld_ly_dwss d,res_ys_xt x,res_ys y where (l.status != '9' or l.status is null) and (y.status != '9' or y.status is null) and d.gld_id=l.xtbh and x.xtbh=y.ssysxt and y.xtbh=d.segment_id and d.restype='AD605' and x.xtbh=#{xtbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by l.zymc
select zymc,xtbh from res_ys y where (y.status != '9' or y.status is null) and ssysxt=#{xtbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by zymc
